member.name: T:Riskmaster.Common.Globalization
member.summary: Riskmaster.Common.Globalization provides access to methods to ease internationalization efforts.

member.name: F:Riskmaster.Common.Globalization.m_resourceManagers
member.summary: m_resourceManagers stores a pool of resource managers to ease internationalization efforts. Using this method to get a ResourceManager in Riskmaster code minimizes memory requirements.

member.name: M:Riskmaster.Common.Globalization.GetResourceManager(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Riskmaster.Common.Globalization.GetResourceManager provides internal access to a single ResourceManager object for internal use by the GetString and GetObject static methods.

member.name: M:Riskmaster.Common.Globalization.GetString(System.String)
member.summary: Riskmaster.Common.Globalization.GetString provides simplified resource string retrieval for all Riskmaster assemblies.

member.name: M:Riskmaster.Common.Globalization.GetObject(System.String)
member.summary: Riskmaster.Common.Globalization.GetObject provides simplified resource object retrieval for all Riskmaster assemblies.

member.name: P:Riskmaster.Common.Globalization.ResourceManager
member.summary: Riskmaster.Common.Globalization.ResourceManager provides simplified access to a single ResourceManager object to ease internationalization efforts.
